Package org.opengrok.indexer.configuration

Class SuperIndexSearcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.lucene.search.IndexSearcher
      • org.opengrok.indexer.configuration.SuperIndexSearcher
  • public class SuperIndexSearcher
extends org.apache.lucene.search.IndexSearcher
    Wrapper class over IndexSearcher which keeps SearcherManager around so that we can simply return the indexSearcher to it.
    Author:
    vkotal
